name: Antidote Herb
desc: The antidote herb washed away the poison tracts, but weakens you.
apply_message: The effects of poison fades, but you succumb to its bitterness...

name: Herbal Medicine
desc: The herbal medicine nullifies the traces of poison.
apply_message: The effects of poison start to fade away...

name: Power Seed
desc: The power seed effect lingers within you!
apply_message: You've felt a sudden surge of immensive strength!

name: Demondrug
desc: The demondrug effect lingers within you!
apply_message: You've felt a sudden surge of strength!

name: Mega Demondrug
desc: The mega demondrug effect lingers within you!
apply_message: You've felt a sudden surge of immensive strength!

name: Armor Seed
desc: The armor seed effect lingers within you!
apply_message: You've felt your body withdraw from great pain!

name: Armorskin
desc: The armorskin effect lingers within you!
apply_message: You've felt your body withdraw from pain!

name: Hot Drink
desc: The hot drink effect wards you from the frigid air.
apply_message: Its taste brings warmth to your body!

name: Cold Drink
desc: The cold drink effect wards you from extreme heat.
apply_message: Its taste brought a frosty feeling to your body!
